question: The figure (see image below) shows the power delivered to a baseball while in contact with the bat. Which of the following is greatest at the peak of the curve?

answers.answer: The kinetic energy of the ball
answers.feedback: This is when the curve hits zero.

answers.answer: The rate at which the bat supplies energy to the ball
The total work the bat has done on the ball
answers.feedback: This is the integral over the curve.
